abilities.name: Shadow Wings
abilities.description: Toulon can unfurl its wings and create an aura of darkness within a 30-foot radius, negating normal and magical light of 3rd level or lower. Toulon can create or dismiss this darkness as an action.

abilities.name: Heart Devourer
abilities.description: When Toulon hits a creature with an attack, the target must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 4d12 + 5 piercing damage and 4d10 + 4 psychic damage. If the target dies, Toulon devours its heart, gaining 50 temporary hit points.

abilities.name: Dark Aura
abilities.description: All creatures within 30 feet of Toulon have a -2 penalty to saving throws and attack rolls while within the Dark Aura.

abilities.name: Overwhelming Attack
abilities.description: Toulon can use its action to perform an overwhelming attack. Each creature within a 20-foot radius of Toulon must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take 4d10 + 5 slashing damage and be incapacitated for 1 minute, reducing its speed to 0.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Toulon makes three attacks: one with its antler and two with its claws.

abilities.name: Incorporeal Movement
abilities.description: The shadow wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

abilities.name: Shadow Stealth
abilities.description: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow wraith can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

abilities.name: Shadowy Tendrils
abilities.description: The shadow beast can extend its shadowy tendrils up to 10 feet and make a grapple attack as a bonus action. On a hit, the target is grappled (escape DC 12). While grappled, the target takes 7 (2d6) necrotic damage at the start of its turn.
